Pre-Game Insights: The United States has been one of the surprise packages of the tournament thus far and will be looking to further enhance their burgeoning reputation against a Proteas team which has won all of their games but not been particularly convincing.
Others: The ICC Menâ€™s T20 World Cup is taking place from 19-25 June 2024, and the Super 8 stage is upon us with eight teams divided into two groups and battling through more round-robin action to reach the semifinals.
Others (Group 1): Group 1 is made up of India, Australia, Bangladesh and Afghanistan. It gets underway on the afternoon of Thursday 20 June with a clash between Afghanistan and India in Bridgetown Barbados.
Others (Group 2): Group 2 features the United States, South Africa, West Indies and England. The first match arrives on the afternoon of Wednesday 19 June, when the USA takes on SA at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in North Sound.
